title: In case of the plot consisting of only tenant occupied building, the F
clause_text: In case of the plot consisting of only tenant occupied building, the F.S.I. shall be equal to F.S.I. required for rehabilitation of existing lawful tenant plus 50% incentive F.S.I. and the occupier shall be eligible for 5% additional rehab carpet area.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
